mobs.LongDesc: A bouncer is here, leaning back in his chair
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This man is wearing a skintight, sleeveless shirt that shows
off his hard earned muscles well.

mobs.LongDesc: Toni Diebold is sitting here, looking pretty.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This woman is tall with brown hair and hazel eyes.  She is
dressed in a bathrobe and slippers while she prepares for her
nightly show.

mobs.LongDesc: Johnny Kelly is sitting here talking to Patch
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This is a VERY good-looking man.  His dark hair and dark eyes
hide what could be a very sinister side of him.  He is dressed
in a white suit with a black shirt and white tie underneath.  A
black fedora covers his head.

mobs.LongDesc: Patch is sitting here listening to Johnny.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The first thing you notice is the patch that this man has over
one of his deep blue eyes.  His hair is dark and he is wearing a
long black trenchcoat over a black pinstripped suit with a white
shirt and black tie.

mobs.LongDesc: Blackjack is here, ready to deal you in to a game.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Blackjack smirks at you as you try to get a good look at him.
He is about, you figure, 5'10 and rather lean.  You notice a pair
of .45 automatics in his shoulder holsters which are only seen
because he has removed his jacket.  His black hair is messed up
as if he usually wears a hat, but he doesn't have it on now.

mobs.LongDesc: A gunmoll is here looking pretty and looking dangerous.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This doll is beautiful.  Her long legs and baby blue eyes can
tempt the heart of even the truest man.  Her flowing, shoulder
length, blonde hair adds to the effect.  You should probably
stay away from her though as she is probably the moll of some
member of one of the mobs.

mobs.LongDesc: A barpatron is here looking angrily at you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The barpatron is kind of muscular, but is starting to develop a
bit of a beer belly.  His jacket is laying over the seat next to
him which lets you get a good look at the gun he could easily use
to try and kill you.  He looks as though he is upset with your look.

mobs.LongDesc: There is a cub reporter here asking for details about a killing last night.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This kid looks to be somewhere between 12 and 16 and is busy
sticking his nose into other people's business.  He hopes to
someday be a full fledged reporter.  But only if he can survive.

mobs.LongDesc: A cabbie shouts obscenities at you from his open cab window.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A relatively short, pudgy man.  He is wearing a grey sweatshirt
with hood and the sleeves rolled up.  A quilted vest is worn over
the sweatshirt.  You can tell that if the man took off the green
plaid golf cap he would be balding.  A big stogie sticks out of
his mouth, barely burned.

mobs.LongDesc: Bugs Morgan stands here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A short man with greased back, black, ducktailed style hair.
He is wearing a black suit and black pants with a bream colored
carnation in his lapel.  You notice a gun, half hidden by his
suit jacket, on his right side.

mobs.LongDesc: A gunman is pointing his gun at you.
mobs.DetailedDesc: The gunman is wear ing a black fedora and a long trenchcoat.

mobs.LongDesc: A roulette girl is here, ready to spin the wheel.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The roulette girl is dressed in a flapper dress cut very short
on her.  She seems to know how to carry herself around men, and
is, in fact, the center of attention for most of the men here.

mobs.LongDesc: A sailor is just strolling along.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The sailor is dressed in white pants and a white shirt accented
with blue designs.  On his head he is wearing a sailor's cap. He
seems to be quite happy to be ashore.

mobs.LongDesc: There is a PI crouched here, looking for clues.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
He's dressed in a business suit and tie.  He seems to be looking
at something VERY closely.

mobs.LongDesc: A rat is here eyeing you hungrily.
mobs.DetailedDesc: Big, brown, ugly.  What else do you have to know?  It's a RAT.

mobs.LongDesc: A big, hairy spider is here spinning a web
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The spider is big, black and hairy.  Its long legs scurry along
the web trying to make an interesting design.  It notices you
looking at it and it springs to attack!

mobs.LongDesc: There's a mighty big fish here.  You belive it may be a SHARK!!
mobs.DetailedDesc:
By the dorsal fin and the shape of its tail, you can tell that
this is a Great White shark.  But what is it doing in fresh water?
Seems that this shark can live in fresh water, in fact it seems
to thrive on it.

mobs.LongDesc: A Bank Guard stands here guarding the vaults
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Dressed in a dark blue uniform and armed with his trusty sidearm,
the bank guard is here to protect your money.

mobs.LongDesc: Mr. Jones is here to help with your jewlery selection.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Mr. Jones looks as though he's about 30 years old.  He seems to be slightly
pudgy, probably from his wife's home cooking, but you've heard he can be
quick if you try to steal from him.  YOu notice a gun on his left hip, half
covered by the suit jacket he is wearing.  Mr. Jones is smiling at you 
trying to help you decide what to buy.

mobs.LongDesc: Doctor Jack stands here holding a patient chart.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Dr. Jack is standing here going over some patient files.  He
looks up as you approach, but looks uninterested in your scrutiny.
He turns back to his files and quickly scans the next page.

mobs.LongDesc: Mr. Johnson is ready to help you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Mr. Johnson is a short stocky man with a balding head.  He is
rather jolly and is fun to be around, unless you're caught trying
to steal from his store.  Then he becomes a tyrant that has no match!

mobs.LongDesc: The clerk looks too dim to work here, but his muscles change your mind.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A large individual, who seems mendally slow.  His hulking frame is
built like a fighter, and seems to bulge as you look at him.

mobs.LongDesc: Torina is standing here greeting people at the door.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You can tell from her complexion that Torina is not too far
gone from the old country.  Her dark hair and complexion makes
you think of a mafia movie, and you quickly realize why her
restuarant is so successful.

mobs.LongDesc: A fisherman sits here putting a worm on his hook.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The fisherman is dressed in overalls and a plaid shirt.  He
looks very old and grey.  His hands shake as he tries to put
the worm on the hook.  Looks as though the worm might win!

mobs.LongDesc: Stacey is the clerk here and she is waiting to help you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Stacey looks to be about 18 years old.  Her mouth works around
a huge wad of gum and it looks like she hasn't moused her hair
in about 5 minutes.  Stacey walks over to you and gives you a
seductive little smile before she starts asking you about what
you need help with.

mobs.LongDesc: Samson is here to get your fish order for you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Samson looks as if he could easily be an old sea captain.  He
looks weathered and gray as if he has fought many great fish and
not just in the Great Lake behind the stand.  He glances at you
as you look at him then he sighs and goes back to the magazine
he was reading.

mobs.LongDesc: Jerry the barber is working on a customer as you walk in.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
As you walk up to Jerry, his attention shifts from the little
boy whose hair he is cutting, to you.  He takes a quite glance
at your attire and sighs.  The he says to have a seat while you
wait for your turn to come around.

mobs.LongDesc: Charlie the Bartender is here waiting for your drink order.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Charlie is a middle-aged man.  The only reason he was able to
bring his bar into the casino was because he was good friends
with Markus, the owner of the Blue Parrot.  Charlie is willing
to listen to your problems if you are willing to talk to him.

mobs.LongDesc: Reverend Whitman is stand in the pulpit talking about Christ.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Reverend Whitman looks like the epitome of christian goodness.
His dark suit contrasts his white hair and he seems almost
godly to you.  Your eyes meet and you can sense the power that
hides behind his inncoent charm.

mobs.LongDesc: Sam the Usher is here to guide you to your seat
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Sam the usher patiently stands here.  He is wearing a spotless
uniform with a great deal of gold trim.  Working with his trusty
flashlight, he is always ready to help you find a seat.

mobs.LongDesc: A busboy is here tossing glasses into his cart.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The busboy looks up at you when you approach him, but he doesn't
seem very interested it what you think.  He goes back to tossing
all the plates and glasses into his wash tub without much thought.

mobs.LongDesc: The lighthouse keeper is here polishing the light.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Before you stands a scrawny old man.  His wrinkled eyes peer at
you through wire rimmed spectacles. He looks like he hasn't shaven
in weeks and his smell make you think that he had a bath last
July, whether he needed it or not.

mobs.LongDesc: One of those annoying, yappy dogs your grandma likes is barking here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The dog perks up at your attention.  He runs over and starts
trying to climb you your leg. (or at least you hope he is trying
to climb.) It reminds you of the time your grandma told you she
had a surprise for you and it piddled in your lap.

mobs.LongDesc: You leap off the sidewalk as a kid on a scooter flys by.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A boy riding a scooter made of old roller skates and an
orange crate.  He seems to be picking up all sorts of things, like string,
and anything else he can trade with other kids.

mobs.LongDesc: Derrick is here ready to make a deal with you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Derrick is tall and thin with dark brown hair and glasses.  He
seems interested in what you might be able to sell him.  He'll
buy a lot, but even he admits that he won't by everything.

mobs.LongDesc: A bellhop lounges up against a counter while waiting for you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This guy looks like he has seen it all happen at this hotel
or another.  From movie stars to sex scandals, you think this
is the guy to ask.  He looks up at you as you approach.

mobs.LongDesc: The hotels concierge is here helping guests to get what they need.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
If you need it, then this man can get it.  He has contacts so
deep that even he doesn't know who they all are.  He can get you
a little company, or a little happy-time dust.  Whatever you like
is what he can get for you.

mobs.LongDesc: A train engineer waits patiently for the next train, and his call to duty.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A middle-aged man sits here passing the time by reading the
paper and constantly checking his watch.  You hear him mutter,
'The 8:15 is late again....'

mobs.LongDesc: Av overworked businessman is having a bad dream here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You have seen him everywhere you go.  Sitting alone in a bar,
eating a club sandwich in the restaurant, being miserable in
general is his way of life.  He works far too much for far too
little and never complains about it.  It has given him a cronic
ulcer problem which causes him to shudder in pain every so often.

mobs.LongDesc: A maid for the hotel is here vacuuming the floor.
mobs.DetailedDesc: A little old lady in a white uniform.  You've seen her before.

mobs.LongDesc: A working girl stands here and says, 'I have something you might want.'
mobs.DetailedDesc:
From the clothes she is wearing, you would guess that she has
not changed changed in about 3 days.  Maybe it is just you, but
anything that is supposed to be skintight just shouldn't have
wrinkles in it.  Maybe she just needs the right guy to show her
the error of her ways.  She's not really all that bad looking,
maybe you should give it a try...

mobs.LongDesc: A harried customer sits here waiting for the train.  She looks upset.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Disheveled hair and completely messed make-up marks this woman's
appearance. She looks as if she has been waiting 3 years for the
next bus, and from the look of the station she may well have been.
She doesn't look like a happy camper right now and she stares at
you for intrusion into her own hell.

mobs.LongDesc: Mariano sizes you up as you walk in the door, maybe he has your size.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Mariano looks quite a lot like some of the merchandise he sells.
He has a weasely face and you are constantly reminded that he
needs a bath by the odor wafting your way.  The fur cap on his
head looks more like a glorified road kill than anything else.
You decide that it might be better to stay away from Mariano.

mobs.LongDesc: A deranged cult member looks up as you interrupt his virgin sacrifice.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Darkness literally surrounds the man who stands before you.  From
the necklace of human ears to the earring of putrid flesh, he is
an unholy sight to behold.  You can feel your faith dissolving
as you see what is allowed to happen on this planet.  And you are
terrified for the future.

mobs.LongDesc: A common street punk glares at you and you wonder if it is safe.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The leather jackets give it all away, they are from the Crimson
Death, and they really mean business.  You wonder what exactly
you have stepped into and you wonder if you will survive.  You
hope beyond hope that they haven't noticed you yet, but then they
all trun and look.  To late!

mobs.LongDesc: Bernie is leaning on the shelf reading the mag, but he will help you if you want something.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Bernie looks sa though he's seen a lot of people grow up and
has lives a long life.  He is about 50 or so years old with a
mostly bald head.  What hair he has left is as white as snow.
His eyes, when he finally looks at you, are a piercing green.

mobs.LongDesc: Max is here ready to get you your order.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Looking at Max you think him to be about 28 years old.  His
hair is a light brown, and his eyes are green.  He is a very
cheerful man and is left alone by the "organizations" that
usually demand protection money.

mobs.LongDesc: Maxx, Leader of the Workers is here, looking over his crew.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A tall statured man is here.  He is holding a piece of iron in
his hand, and he is looking over his workers.

mobs.LongDesc: Angelo, better known as Doc is here reading a book.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Doc is about 6 feet tall with black hair.  He has hazel grey eyes.
He is squarely built and has an olive complexion.  He is wearing a
nice suit and he has short wavy hair.

mobs.LongDesc: Snake-Eyes stands before you waiting for you to roll
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A tall and ruggedly built man stands before you.  He is dressed
in a tuxedo and holds a pair of dice out for you to roll.

mobs.LongDesc: A trolley car is here, carrying people around the city.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This is a large trolley car, filled with people.  It doesn't seem to be a
threat, unless you are stupid enough to step in front of it.  The trolley
driver yells at you, "Hey!  Either get on or get outta tha way!"

mobs.LongDesc: Chester the Soda Jerk stands before you mixing a sundae
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A middle aged man stands before you.  He is dressed in a white
shirt freshly stained from the last sundae he made.  His white
hat tops off the outfit.

mobs.LongDesc: A worker is here.
mobs.DetailedDesc: A worker is here, looking at you curiously.

mobs.LongDesc: There is a woman walking down the street
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The woman is innocently going to the store to buy supper for
her husband.

mobs.LongDesc: A gunman is pointing his gun at you.
mobs.DetailedDesc: The gunman is wearing a black fedora and a black trenchcoat.
